trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around October 31st 2010
divs: sighting detailsdriving home with my 16yr daughter and friend, @ approx 2:15am, westbound on kuebler blvd at lone oak rd se approx 45 mph, spotted object\bright light that 'appeared' in sw sky to the left of drivers window, low in the sky, below venus, closer to earth rather than faraway feel, flight appeared downward, object was pointed at front with red light on 'nose', had three pronged tail, yellowish in color, very bright, we all said "hey do you see that - what is that?" - it moved across\coming down-west for approx 10 sec., now in front of us - then disappeared from sky\sight. weather was partly cloudy, clouds moving quickly across sky, which opened up to crisp night sky in fall in pnw this time of year.
Summary: spotted in sw sky traveling westbound on kuebler blvd
